walledtemplates.MeasuredTemplateConfigur: Template ignores walls that do not block this type.
Connect this template so it moves along with the token.
walledtemplates.dnd5e-spell-config.add-t: If spell is centered on a token, add the token size (min of width/height) to the template size.
walledtemplates.settings.menu.title: Default Shape Settings
Select default for newly created circle templates. Circles can spread but not reflect.
walledtemplates.settings.default_cone.Hi: Select default for newly created cone templates. Cones can reflect but not spread.
walledtemplates.settings.default_ray.Hin: Select default for newly created ray templates. Rays can reflect but not spread.
walledtemplates.settings.default_rect.Hi: Select default for newly created rectangle templates. Rectangles can spread but not reflect.
walledtemplates.settings.default-circle-: Walls that block this type will block circle templates.
walledtemplates.settings.default-cone-wa: Walls that block this type will block cone templates.
walledtemplates.settings.default-ray-wal: Walls that block this type will block ray templates.
walledtemplates.settings.default-rect-wa: Walls that block this type will block rectangular templates.
walledtemplates.settings.autotarget-menu: When toggle option is selected, a bullseye control button in the template control bar will allow you to switch between targeting or not targeting.
walledtemplates.settings.autotarget-meth: How to highlight grid squares and autotarget tokens under templates.
walledtemplates.settings.autotarget-area: For overlap highlight/autotarget method only. Percent token bounds or grid area that must overlap the template to count. 0 means any overlap counts. (Hint: use the arrow keys after clicking the square to increment by steps of 0.01.)
walledtemplates.settings.snapGrid.Name: Snap to grid intersections
walledtemplates.settings.snapGrid.Hint: Hold shift when dragging templates to snap to half-grid increments, such as a grid square center.
walledtemplates.settings.diagonal-scalin: Scale ray templates to conform with the 5-5-5 diagonal rule.
Scale cone templates to conform with the 5-5-5 diagonal rule.
Convert circle templates to squares to better conform with the 5-5-5 diagonal rule.
walledtemplates.settings.hideBorder.Name: Hide template border
walledtemplates.settings.hideBorder.Hint: Unless hovering over the template control icon, do not show the outline of the template shape.
walledtemplates.settings.hideHighlightin: Unless hovering over the template control icon, do not show the highlighted grid for the template.
walledtemplates.notifications.attach-las: Please select a token to attach.
Please target a token to attach.
